Equipment Actions.Action 1: Tentacles, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 4 Poison, Can Poison hit targets
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 7 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Carrion Crawler makes 2 attacks, one with its tentacles and one with its bite

Abilities.Ability 1: Keen Smell, The Carrion Crawler has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell
Abilities.Ability 2: Spider Climb, The Carrion Crawler can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check
